title: Bloomberg Markets: Cordaro Prefers Apple Over Amazon
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Cordaro Prefers Apple Over Amazon
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Christopher J Cordaro Chief Executive Officer and Chief Investment Officer RegentAtlantic Discussing investing in tech stocks and his concern that Amazon.com has not figured out how to turn a profit.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
